hero-description: Dive into interactive courses, enjoy exciting games, and challenge yourself with fun quizzes!

hero.description: We are a global platform offering personalized lessons in Arabic, Islamic studies, and the Quran. With highly qualified teachers, we aim to make learning Arabic and Quranic studies enjoyable and accessible for students and parents worldwide.
hero.quote: Allah says: "ŸàŸÑŸÇÿØ Ÿäÿ≥ÿ±ŸÜÿß ÿßŸÑŸÇÿ±ÿ¢ŸÜ ŸÑŸÑÿ∞ŸÉÿ± ŸÅŸáŸÑ ŸÖŸÜ ŸÖÿØŸÉÿ±" When your eyes fall upon this verse, know that all meanings of ease and simplicity in your mind are embodied in it.
hero.quote1: Clear your mind with us, come with an open heart, leave distractions behind, and read, feeling the greatness of the words and the majesty of the Speaker. Register with Al-Fath Institute to help you achieve all this and much more.

About_Ain.free-lesson: One free lesson for every new student

INSTITUTE.TITLE: Al-Fath Institute for Arabic Language
INSTITUTE.DESCRIPTION_1: Our lessons are carefully designed to align with your individual goals, whether for professional life, travel to any Arab country, reading in Arabic, exploring Arab culture, Islamic culture, or religious studies.
INSTITUTE.DESCRIPTION_2: Individual language training at Al-Fath Institute helps you achieve your goals with the support and motivation of a personal teacher who possesses high competency in teaching Arabic.
INSTITUTE.DESCRIPTION_3: Enjoy interactive educational classes designed to build trust between you and the institute and help you learn effectively and enjoyably. Educational classes at Al-Fath Institute are the key to improving fluency in learning Arabic, memorizing the Holy Quran, and studying Islamic sciences.

header.title: Why Parents and Children Love Ain Academy

mainFeature.description: Ain Academy is the top choice for parents, offering flexible, evolving curriculums in Arabic, Quran memorization, and Islamic studies. We focus on building strong relationships with students and parents to support their learning needs.

descriptions.video1: Maximize your experience on our platform in under 5 minutes.
descriptions.video2: Learn about powerful features to enhance your learning.
descriptions.video3: Watch how others succeed with our platform.

feature0.title: Why Parents Choose Ain Academy
feature0.description: Ain Academy fosters positive relationships and plays a key role in shaping the future of students and the community.

feature1.title: Excellence in Arabic Language
feature1.description: A comprehensive Arabic curriculum, tailored to each student's pace, whether slow or fast.

feature2.title: Quran Studies
feature2.description: Starting with foundational books, we help students read and memorize the Quran correctly.

feature3.title: Islamic Studies
feature3.description: Our program covers essential faith knowledge, including the biography of the Prophet (PBUH), stories of the Mothers of the Believers, Islamic etiquette, and moral values.

FEATURES.EXPERT_TEACHERS_DESC: Learn from certified native Arabic speakers with years of teaching experience
FEATURES.INTERACTIVE_LEARNING_DESC: Engage in dynamic, interactive sessions designed for maximum retention
FEATURES.PERSONALIZED_DESC: Customized learning plans tailored to your specific goals and pace
FEATURES.ISLAMIC_STUDIES_DESC: Comprehensive programs combining Arabic language with Islamic sciences

registration.desc: At Ain Academy, we offer a comprehensive program for teaching Arabic to non-native speakers, Quran memorization, and Islamic studies. We believe that each student has unique learning needs, so we use a flexible curriculum that can be tailored to match their pace and style. Our goal is to provide an inspiring educational environment that fosters a love for the Arabic language and deepens understanding, all under the guidance of highly experienced and specialized teachers.
registration.title: Register easily and start your learning journey
registration.coursesCount: A member of our team will contact you
registration.coursesText: to guide you through the registration process
registration.subtitle: Give your child the opportunity to learn and grow from anywhere in the world

firstName.error: First Name is required and must be at least 2 characters long.

lastName.error: Last Name is required and must be at least 2 characters long.

subject.headerTitle: Join the Ain Academy Teaching Team
subject.headerSubtitle: Empower students worldwide by becoming part of Ain Academy's dedicated team of educators, shaping the future of learning with passion and expertise.
subject.headerQuote: At Ain Academy, we believe education is more than knowledge‚Äîit's about transforming lives. Join us in creating a nurturing, dynamic learning environment.

subjectCards.title: Islamic Studies
subjectCards.description: We seek teachers who can provide insightful and deep understanding of Islamic principles and history.

subjectCards.title: Qur'an
subjectCards.description: Join our institute to teach students the recitation and memorization of the Holy Qur'an.

subjectCards.title: Arabic Language
subjectCards.description: Help us preserve the beauty of the Arabic language by teaching it to our enthusiastic students.

cards.title: Arabic Language Course
cards.description: At Ain Academy, we offer a flexible and comprehensive curriculum for teaching Arabic to non-native speakers. We adapt to your pace and needs to achieve the best results.

cards.title: Quran Learning Course
cards.description: At Ain Academy, we start with students of various levels to teach accurate Quran reading, focusing on memorization and understanding through engaging methods.

cards.title: Islamic Studies Course
cards.description: At Ain Academy, we offer a unique journey in Islamic studies, covering the Prophet‚Äôs biography, stories of the Companions, and ethics, presented in an engaging way for all ages.

testimonials.title: What Parents Say About Us
testimonials.headerTitle: Today's Children Will Be Tomorrow's Leaders and Future Worth Investing In
testimonials.headerSubtitle: Ain Academy plays a significant role in the development of students and strengthening their skills within the community. It serves as the foundation after the family in educating and nurturing children, polishing their talents and personalities. A school with a strong educational and moral reputation can establish an enlightened society, passionate about learning, and produce a generation that leaves a positive impact on its future.
testimonials.headerQuote: Many people may overlook the importance of Ain Academy and its significant role in community development. They may neglect enrolling their children, viewing it as a secondary priority, especially due to its focus on the Arabic language alongside the educational system in their home countries like America or Europe. However, this neglect can harm your children's Arabic and Islamic identity, with negative consequences in the future. They could lose the ability to speak Arabic, struggle with reading the Quran, and lack an understanding of the core principles of Islam. Our children are a trust in our care, and we must choose the best educational institutions for them. The school plays a pivotal role in shaping a child's success and upbringing.

blog.title: Latest From Our Blog
blog.subtitle: Stay updated with our latest insights and stories

features.title: Why Kids and Parents Love Us?
features.mainFeatureDescription: Our courses are designed to be engaging and interactive, making learning fun!

accordionFeatures.title: Expert Instructors
accordionFeatures.description: Learn from the best with our experienced and friendly instructors.

accordionFeatures.title: Fun Activities
accordionFeatures.description: Enjoy a variety of fun activities that make learning enjoyable.

members.name: John Doe
members.description: John loves creating exciting learning experiences for kids. His passion for education makes him the perfect leader for our team!

members.name: Jane Smith
members.description: Jane brings creativity and innovation to our projects, making learning fun and engaging for every child.

members.name: Sam Brown
members.description: Sam's expertise in technology ensures that our platform runs smoothly and is always up to date with the latest trends.

QUESTIONS.TITLE: What are the qualifications of your teachers?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: All teachers are graduates of Al-Azhar University

QUESTIONS.TITLE: What is your doctrine of teaching children?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: Our doctrine is the doctrine of the Sunnis and the community, and we do not have any thought or belief that contradicts the word of God and the Sunnah of His Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace.

QUESTIONS.TITLE: What is the nationality of the teachers in your school?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: All of our male and female teachers at the institute are from Egypt

QUESTIONS.TITLE: What are your curricula?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: We have our own curricula in the Arabic language, the Holy Qur‚Äôan, and Islamic sciences

QUESTIONS.TITLE: Do you have education for adults or is education for adults only?
My son is very young. Do you have programs suitable for young children?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: Yes, we have students starting from 4 years old and teachers who specialize in dealing with these ages

QUESTIONS.TITLE: Does my son study alone or with a group?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: At Ain Academy, each student typically studies individually, ensuring personalized attention. However, the academy also allows family members to study together, provided that their levels and progress are similar. This approach ensures that no student is left behind or held back due to varying academic levels.

QUESTIONS.TITLE: After how many months can my son start reading the Holy Quran on his own?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: This depends on his ability to comprehend and follow up with him at home and with the teacher, but after less than six months, the student with us can read alone.

QUESTIONS.TITLE: My son‚Äôs schedule is very busy, so I find it difficult to coordinate a fixed time for class?
QUESTIONS.CONTENT: We have a full supervisory staff working 24 hours a day, and their mission is to provide a convenient time for you. In coordination with him, he can reschedule classes for the appropriate time with you.

NOTIFICATION.ERROR: There was an error submitting the form.

Arabic-course.description: Offering: Arabic Language Course for Non-Native Speakers
Arabic-course.why_choose: Why Choose Ain Academy's Arabic Course?
points: A flexible and adaptive curriculum designed to teach Arabic to all age groups and proficiency levels.
A team of specialized teachers who are native Arabic speakers, using the latest educational methods and tools.
Comprehensive courses covering reading, writing, listening, and speaking to ensure a complete learning experience.
For students who cannot read or write, we start from the basics, teaching the alphabet and progressing to reading and writing fluently.
Lessons can be customized to suit each student's pace, whether they prefer a slow, methodical approach or a fast and focused one.

objectives.title: Course Objectives:
points: Enable students to master the Arabic language through a flexible and advanced teaching methodology.
Teach children and adults all aspects of the Arabic language, from basics to advanced levels.
Promote Arabic and Islamic cultural identity through lessons related to the Quran and Islamic studies.

Arabic-course.call_to_action: Book your spot now! Don‚Äôt miss the opportunity to teach your children Arabic and enhance their cultural and religious identity.
Arabic-course.registration: To register or learn more details, please visit the registration page.

Islamic-course.description: Ain Academy offers a distinguished Islamic studies program for all ages, focusing on developing strong moral character and understanding of Islamic teachings.
Islamic-course.why_choose: Why choose Ain Academy's Islamic studies course?
points: Our curriculum covers various aspects of Islamic knowledge including Seerah (life of Prophet Muhammad Ô∑∫), stories of the mothers of the believers, and Islamic manners.
We teach important Islamic values, such as honesty, generosity, and respect, while also addressing negative traits like lying, dishonesty, and greed.
Our program is designed to be engaging, with illustrations and simple explanations suitable for children of all ages.
Interactive lessons and modern teaching tools are used to keep students engaged while learning.
Students learn Islamic etiquette and moral behavior that can be applied in daily life.

objectives.title: Course Objectives:
points: Introduce students to key figures in Islamic history like the Prophet Muhammad Ô∑∫ and his companions.
Instill good character and moral behavior by teaching Islamic ethics and values.
Provide a deeper understanding of Islamic teachings, fostering both spiritual growth and social responsibility.

Islamic-course.call_to_action: Reserve your spot now! Help your children learn the important values and ethics of Islam while strengthening their faith.
Islamic-course.registration: To register or learn more, please visit the registration page.

Quran-course.description: Ain Academy offers a specialized Qur'an course designed for children and youth who are non-readers of Arabic, starting from the basics to the correct recitation and memorization of the Qur'an.
Quran-course.why_choose: Why choose Ain Academy's Qur'an course?
points: A structured curriculum starting with foundational books like Noor Al-Bayan, Fath Al-Rahman, and Al-Qaidah Al-Baghdadiyah for beginners.
We focus on teaching children the correct recitation of the Qur'an, even for those who cannot read or write, using simplified and interactive methods.
For children who are not yet able to read, we start with memorization of the Qur'an using dictation, understanding the meanings of words, and simple interpretations.
Our team of experienced teachers ensures that all students learn in a supportive and engaging environment.
We incorporate modern technology and interactive tools to make Qur'anic learning both enjoyable and effective.

objectives.title: Course Objectives:
points: Enable children to read and memorize the Qur'an correctly.
Help children understand the meanings and interpretations of the Qur'an.
Instill a love for the Qur'an and ensure strong retention through practical methods.

Quran-course.call_to_action: Reserve your spot now! Don‚Äôt miss this valuable opportunity to help your children connect with the Qur'an and develop proper recitation and memorization skills.
Quran-course.registration: To register or learn more, please visit the registration page.
